扯.definition: to pull; to tear; (of cloth, thread etc) to buy; to chat; to gossip; (coll.) (Tw) ridiculous; hokey

扯嗓子.definition: to raise one's voice; to speak at the top of one's voice

扯家常.definition: to engage in small talk; to chit chat

扯平.definition: to make even; to balance; (fig.) to be even; to call it quits

扯後腿.definition: to be a drag or hindrance on sb

扯犢子.definition: (dialect) to talk nonsense; to chat idly

扯皮條.definition: see 拉皮條|拉皮条[la1 pi2 tiao2]

扯直.definition: to straighten (by pulling or stretching); to be even (neither side losing out)

扯遠.definition: to digress; to get sidetracked; to go off on a tangent

扯雞巴蛋.definition: to talk shit; to drivel; bullshit
